summary: Completed testing of XRP Multi-Chain Wallet application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), and landing page works perfectly with all features. However, wallet creation/import flows are not completing properly, preventing access to main application features (Dashboard, Wallet, Swap, Buy pages).

critical_bugs.issue: Wallet creation and import forms submit but do not complete - users are redirected back to landing page
critical_bugs.selector: Create/Import wallet modals and form submission
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks access to all main application features (Dashboard, Wallet, Swap, Buy)

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts click events during form submission, requiring force=True clicks
ui_bugs.selector: Dialog overlays in wallet creation/import modals

passed_tests: Landing page features section (Non-Custodial, Lightning Fast, Multi-Chain, Swap to XRP)
Landing page navigation buttons with data-testids
Route protection (redirects to landing when no wallet)
action_item_for_main_agent: Critical Issue: Wallet creation and import flows are not completing properly. Both create and import wallet forms open correctly, accept user input, but after form submission, users are redirected back to the landing page instead of proceeding to the dashboard. This blocks access to all main application features. Please investigate the wallet management logic in the frontend and ensure wallet creation/import persistence is working correctly.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Landing page perfect, but wallet flows blocking main app access
